fields.hint: What are your thoughts on breastfeeding
values: I do not want to breastfeed

media.media_text:
This is an excellent choice. You are making a good choice to give your child the best start to life.
Breastmilk is clean and wholesome and provides all the essential nutrients and vitamins your baby needs for a healthy start to life. Give only breastmilk in the first 5 months of life including no water, tea, or milk or any other liquid and immediately breastfeed within an hour of delivery.

media.media_trigger_value: I do not want to breastfeed
